title: vEluNDu tuNaiyAi
sahitya:
veluNDu tuNaiyAi mayiluNDu murugA vIruDan vilangum nin Arumukamum uNDu


anupallavi

   shIlamuDan iniya kOlamuDan ilangum sendUr kumarA unnai cintanai sheidiDave


caraNam    aruTkumara guruvum arunagiriyArum arum tamizh nakkIrarum aDiyAr pala pErum
karuNai pozhiyum nin tiruvaDiyai pADa kAttaruL purindiTTa kandA shiva maindA
